examples.example: 我在海边捡到了一枚漂亮的贝壳。

translate.english: I picked up a beautiful shell by the seaside.

examples.example: 我送给朋友一枚自己亲手制作的书签，表达我的心意。

translate.english: I gave a bookmark made by myself to my friend to express my feelings.

examples.example: 我获得了一枚代表荣誉的勋章，感到无比自豪。

translate.english: I obtained a medal representing honor and felt extremely proud.
